sentences.sentence: Upon arrival you will have the local kampong style breakfast.
sentences.translation: 抵达后，体验富有当地部落风俗的早餐。

sentences.sentence: Coconut trees, banana trees, wooden hut, beach and white sand - Kampong life style.
sentences.translation: 蕉风椰雨，小木屋，海滩和白沙-传统式的马来乡村风情。

sentences.sentence: We then headed to Kampong Cham with its impressive Mekong-spanning bridge; the river here is magnificent, brooding, massive.
sentences.translation: 然后我们驶向磅湛，经过壮观的湄公河大桥，这一段湄公河河面开阔，水势浩荡。
